testcase.system-out: Given guest user go to registration page....................................passed When guest user fill registration data......................................passed And guest user click on register button.....................................passed Then registration success message should appear.............................passed

testcase.classname: user will be able to choose between sliders in homepage
testcase.name: first slider is clickable at homepage
testcase.failure:
When user clicks on first slider............................................passed Then relative product for first slider is displayed.........................failed
